tool_description: Convert a document into HTML, text or a set of JSON answers.
name: IBMWatsonDocumentConversion
title: IBMWatsonDocumentConversion

api_list.name: convertPDFToJsonUnits
api_list.description: Converts a `pdf` document to json answer units.

required_parameters.name: file
required_parameters.description: The `pdf` file to convert. Maximum file size is 50 MB.

optional_parameters.name: headingFonts
optional_parameters.description: PDF heading font configurations. See README for more info.

optional_parameters.name: normalizedHtml
optional_parameters.description: An object that defines the content that is included and excluded during the HTML normalization phase. All documents go through this phase. For more information about the normalized_html configurations, see README for more info.

optional_parameters.name: selectorTags
optional_parameters.description: JSON Array. Defines the heading level that splits into answer units. Valid values are h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, or an array of these values. By default, h1 and h2 headings with their content are split into answer units.

optional_parameters.name: normalizedHtml
optional_parameters.description: An object that defines the content that is included and excluded during the HTML normalization phase. All documents go through this phase. For more information about the normalized_html configurations, see README for more info.

optional_parameters.name: headingFonts

api_list.name: indexDocument
api_list.description: Prepares a document for the Retrieve and Rank service as part of an Enhanced Information Retrieval solution, then adds the content to your Solr index so you can search it.

required_parameters.name: file
required_parameters.description: The file to index. Required if the metadata object is not included. Maximum file size is 50 MB. The API detects the MIME type, but you can specify it if incorrect. Acceptable MIME type values are text/html, text/xhtml+xml, application/pdf, application/msword, and application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document.

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankDryRun
optional_parameters.description: The dryRun property defaults to false. Set it to true to test how your document is indexed. When set to true, service_instance_id, cluster_id, and search_collection are optional.

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankClusterId
optional_parameters.description: Matches the value of solr_cluster_id in your Retrieve and Rank service. Required if dry_run is not set to false.

optional_parameters.name: metadata
optional_parameters.description: A metadata part that describes the external metadata of the file. Required if the file is not included. You might call this method without a file part when there is no document content to index (for example, with a database connector). Maximum size of the part is 1 MB.

optional_parameters.name: normalizedHtml
optional_parameters.description: An object that defines the content that is included and excluded during the HTML normalization phase. All documents go through this phase. For more information about the normalized_html configurations, see README for more info.

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankServiceInstanceId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier or your Retrieve and Rank service. Required if dry_run is not set to false. To find your service_instance_id, click the tile for your service in Bluemix, and then look at the URL in the browser for the serviceGuid= request parameter. The value for service_instance_id is the value for serviceGuid.

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankSearchCollection
optional_parameters.description: Matches the value of collection_name in your Retrieve and Rank service. Required if dry_run is not set to false.

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankFieldsMappings
optional_parameters.description: An array of objects to specify how to connect metadata fields in the file to fields in SOLR. Use the syntax mappings [{"from":"field_in_doc", "to":"field_in_SOLR"}].

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankFieldsInclude
optional_parameters.description: An array of fields in the file to include from Retrieve and Rank. To specify the allowed fields, provide only the include object. When you provide an include object, fields that are not included are excluded. Use the syntax "include":["field3_in_SOLR"].

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankFieldsExclude
optional_parameters.description: An array of fields to exclude from Retrieve and Rank. To exclude a few fields and allow all others, provide only the exclude object. Fields that are not excluded are allowed. Follows the syntax "exclude":["field1_in_SOLR","field2_in_SOLR"].

api_list.name: indexExternalMetadata
api_list.description: Prepares a metadata object for the Retrieve and Rank service as part of an Enhanced Information Retrieval solution, then adds the content to your Solr index so you can search it.

required_parameters.name: metadata
required_parameters.description: An array of metadata JSON objects

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankServiceInstanceId
optional_parameters.description: The identifier or your Retrieve and Rank service. Required if dry_run is not set to false. To find your service_instance_id, click the tile for your service in Bluemix, and then look at the URL in the browser for the serviceGuid= request parameter. The value for service_instance_id is the value for serviceGuid.

optional_parameters.name: normalizedHtml
optional_parameters.description: An object that defines the content that is included and excluded during the HTML normalization phase. All documents go through this phase. For more information about the normalized_html configurations, see README for more info.

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankSearchCollection
optional_parameters.description: Matches the value of collection_name in your Retrieve and Rank service. Required if dry_run is not set to false.

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankClusterId
optional_parameters.description: Matches the value of solr_cluster_id in your Retrieve and Rank service. Required if dry_run is not set to false.

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankDryRun
optional_parameters.description: The dryRun property defaults to false. Set it to true to test how your document is indexed. When set to true, service_instance_id, cluster_id, and search_collection are optional.

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankFieldsMappings
optional_parameters.description: An array of objects to specify how to connect metadata fields in the file to fields in SOLR. Use the syntax mappings [{"from":"field_in_doc", "to":"field_in_SOLR"}].

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankFieldsInclude
optional_parameters.description: An array of fields in the file to include from Retrieve and Rank. To specify the allowed fields, provide only the include object. When you provide an include object, fields that are not included are excluded. Use the syntax "include":["field3_in_SOLR"].

optional_parameters.name: retrieveAndRankFieldsExclude
optional_parameters.description: An array of fields to exclude from Retrieve and Rank. To exclude a few fields and allow all others, provide only the exclude object. Fields that are not excluded are allowed. Follows the syntax "exclude":["field1_in_SOLR","field2_in_SOLR"].
